SLIMER 1.0.0
  • Get started
  • Reference

    Reference

    All functions

    add_prefixes()

    Add SPARQL prefixes to a query.

    fill.query()

    Fill in placeholders in a SPARQL query based on provided parameters.

    format(<result.df>)

    Format and process a data frame of results.

    get.diets()

    Retrieve diet information based on Taxonomy ID or scientific name from a specific SPARQL endpoint.

    get.guilds()

    Retrieve guild information based on Taxonomy ID or scientific name from a specific SPARQL endpoint.

    get.interactions()

    Retrieve interaction information based on Taxonomy ID or scientific name from a specific SPARQL endpoint.

    get.named.graphs()

    Generate a SPARQL FROM NAMED clause for named graphs.

    get.potential.interactions()

    Retrieve potential interaction information based on Taxonomy ID or scientific name from a specific SPARQL endpoint.

    get.source.metadata()

    Retrieve metadata for a specified data source from a specific SPARQL endpoint.

    get.sources()

    Retrieve a list of data sources from a specific SPARQL endpoint.

    get.sparql.values()

    Generate a SPARQL VALUES clause for a variable with specified values.

    get.trophic.groups()

    Retrieve trophic group information based on Taxonomy ID or scientific name from a specific SPARQL endpoint.

    query.by.name()

    Generate a static SPARQL snippet for retrieving information by taxon scientific name.

    query.by.taxid()

    Generate a static SPARQL snippet for retrieving information by Taxonomy ID.

    send.sparql()

    Send a SPARQL query to an endpoint and retrieve results.

    source.tracking()

    Generate a static SPARQL snippet for tracking the source of information about an organism

    to.short.iri()

    Shorten a full IRI using specified namespaces.

    to.short.iris()

    Shorten multiple full IRIs using specified namespaces.
